attributes.action: Renationalise trainlines run by Southern Railway
attributes.additional_details: A "lack of staff" has been an excuse for far too long. All the other train lines manage to give a decent service. It's just southern lines. I use the Caterham and East Grinstead lines on a regular basis.
attributes.background: I am thoroughly disappointed by the service Southern gives us. The uncertainty as to whether a train will actually be there to take us home is unnacceptable given the price of travel. Nationalisation seems like the only short term solution to this problem.
